name: tm89
effect: Teaches U-Turn to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from status
conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type
moves for five turns.
